subject: Protect Yourself & Profit in the Coming Crash
body:
Protect Yourself & Profit in the Coming Crash

 



===========================================
We love giving our InvestorPlace.com members benefits
    like access to this timely message. 
In order to ensure you keep receiving special alerts
      and offers like this one, please take a moment to click
      the link in this message to reconfirm that this is the email address where you want to receive emails from InvestorPlace.com.
      ===========================================








June 13, 2007
Fellow Investor,
While Wall Street was partying like it was 1999 all over again…
…I was warning my Trending123 subscribers – and anyone else who would listen – about the “coming crash.”  I closed all our long-side trades – took our substantial profits – and warned everyone to hunker down until the storm clouds cleared.
Now – with the Dow DOWN more than 400 points at times last week, and continued volatility, I’m getting a lot of “thank-yous” thrown my way.
But I’m not resting on my laurels.  The worst isn’t over – not by a long shot.  That’s why I have an urgent video presentation for you to watch now.
As you’ll see, all the market charts – from the NASDAQ’s “QQQQ” to the S&P 500, and so on – point to an impending calamity for most investors.  The Dow could drop as much as 2,000 points from its highs before it’s all over.
Stand in the way and you will be crushed.
Why should you listen to what I say?   First of all, it’ll only take a few minutes of your time, but could save you many thousands of dollars.
You’ll learn how to protect your portfolio — even how to profit through the plunge, as other investors lose their shirts.
What’s more, I have a history with events like this.   I started my Trending123 trading service back in 1999 precisely to warn people about the impending NASDAQ meltdown.
And if it’s profits you’re looking for, consider this: At Trending123, we have closed 67 short-term trades so far this year, and 78% of them have been winning trades.   On an annualized basis, we’re averaged 114% gains on each one of those trades!
So please, take just a few minutes now to hear me out.   You owe it to yourself to at least consider what I’m saying.
Click here to watch now.
Sincerely,

John LansingTrending123
